ygData.subject: Re: Nerriak Quest Frustration
ygData.msgSnippet: Regular beetle eyes will work for the first quest,just go collect all 10 of them and bring the box back to the Lodge of the Dead.before you hand him the box
ygData.messageBody:
Regular beetle eyes will work for the first quest,just go collect all 10 of
them and bring the box back to the Lodge of the Dead.before you hand him the
box open it up and hit the combine button,this will close the box and
automaticly attach it to your cusor.now give him the closed box and you will
have completed the first stage of the quest and gain some small amount of
Exp. He will then say something about what a good job you did and offer a
second ,more difficult quest to you. This quest involves collecting 4 fire
beetle eyes in a box much similar to the first one but these eyes must come
from Kerra Isle. Also,you must bring back a Bull Elephant tusk which can be
found in the plains around Qyneos. I have yet to complete the part of the
quest but hop to do so this week end,I will keep all abreast of my progress
and if any of you have completed the quest I would be very corious about the
reward. Also as we are KOS in Qyneos and must pass thru there to reach the
boat that goes to Kerra Isle I would like info on how to get to the docks.I
have been told those of evil herratige must take the sewers under the city
to get there and they are quite confusing,thats what I am told anyway,any
info you all mat have would be great.
Thanks.


Nassu,Dark Knight of Innoruuk,Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen Alexander <SAlexander@...>
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com' <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 11:19 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] Nerriak Quest Frustration


>From: Stephen Alexander <SAlexander@...>
>
>I just finished a quest I got in the Lodge of the Dead to gather 10
>beetle eyes in a box. I put 10 fire beetle eyes in, but when I returned
>the box all I got was the NPC saying "worthless junk" 10 times. Anyone
>know what kind of beetle eyes he wants? Needless to say this was
>frustrating.
>
>Rujuro-dark elf (xegony)
